name: Truck Life
description:
Experience a diverse range of truck driving fun with a new truck simulation game. Feel the original map of China and complete hundreds of city specialties. Crosses the mountains, the lakes and the sea, share your truck life.

Features

  • Real driving experience
  • Collect modified accessories to create personalized vehicles
  • Dynamic weather changes, wet roads, please drive carefully
  • The specialties of different seasons are selling well. Do you know that the hairy crabs are listed in the market in a few months?
  • Thousands of kilometers of real road sections, punching nearly 100 landmarks
  • Dozens of real cities and net red towns
publishers: 成都惊叹号科技有限公司
